title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 67-4.6 - Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 67-4.6 - Reporting

State Regulations
(a) As soon as practicable, but no more than 10 business days after the school received the laboratory reports, the school shall report data relating to test results to the Department, local health department, and State Education Department, through the Department's designated statewide electronic reporting system. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
